content:
The Russian occupation army has now become safer to use ballistic weapons for attacks than aviation.

This was stated by Oleksandr Olekhnovich, a public community service officer of the public relations of the Armed Forces of Ukraine on March 8, 2024 on March 8, 2024.

“Ballistic weapons are now the safest path of attack. The planes they have already started to use less. But ballistics ... Their settings do not enter the risk zone or are minimal. And quite safely they can attack our cities, our infrastructure itself, ”he said.

As reported by the Armyinform, in defense forces beforeexplainedHow to fight Russian cabin on the front.
title: The Armed Forces of the Armed Forces told about changes in air attacks by the Russians
author: Army Inform
